experience.title: Program Manager Founder's Office
experience.description: Creating an impact by solving grass root level problems with education, health, entrepreneurship and innovation. Sharda Group of institutions, founded by Mr. P.K. Gupta has been creating a social impact since day 1, being one of the first private universities from the Northern India, it caters to 100,000 students from Undergraduates to doctorate. It has over a thousands alumni across the country. Sharda Group boasts of its diversity and inclusion and it offers education in Engineering, Science, Medicine, Law, Business Administration, Design, Sustainability and Artificial Intelligence. We are on a mission to be the most innovative and cultural campus. Reporting to the Chancellor Office, Chancellor H.E. Mr. P.K. Gupta- Corporate Partnership- Digital Transformation- Campus Innovation- Investments, Expansion and Growth- Teaching and Learning with Al- Propagating equality with Al- Educate, Empower, EntertainPassionate to 'Make U.P. Unstoppable'

experience.title: Assistant Manager
experience.description: Work with a team in the field of digital insurance and smart audit, product development and improvisation.Working on the automation of Audit flow of an Australia-based client. Conducted quarterly competitive benchmarking against several major competitors, derived 7 product roadmap features. Analyse the output result using SQL and key insights using PowerBI. Trained 200+ client-facing implementation consultants, account managers and support team to empower them with product knowledge.

positions.subtitle: Spring Fest

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: Setting up a club from the ground up to develop the culture of Standup Comedy and another form of comical arts and also to provide stage to standup enthusiasts of the IIT Kharagpur community to showcase their talent. Presently we are a team of 70 people gained around 9000 followers on Facebook in a short period and become the fastest-growing student-run organization across IIT Kharagpur. Organised a total of 14 events and got sponsorship of a total of 1.25L.
